page.title: 06ABERSYCHAN FIRE STATION
page.content: The{Fire Station}in{Limekiln Road}is only a{part-time one.}There are{12 men but they all have other jobs and are called by bleepers. They have{1 fire engine}and{1 fire {petrol van.}Both are very big and painted red and silver.{There are 30 {fire engines in Gwent.}The engine carries hoses and a tank which can hold 400 gallons pf water. Water is drawn from a river if there is one near. They also have{special breath- {ing apparatus}and{foam}to use on post- box or chemical fires. The men wear heavy uniforms and hard hats to protect themselves. The men have to be at least 5'8" tall and over 18. At the station is{a new answering {machine}that prints out the details of an emergency call. The firemen said that{roughly 60% of {all calls are false alarms.
